I voted against the reauthorization of FISA because I couldn’t support a bill that neglected to protect Americans’ privacy. The federal government has a responsibility to safeguard national security while also protecting civil liberties​.
These young people are my inspiration. I’m fighting with them and I’m fighting for them. #DACA http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DT2X1C1WkAA_M3R.jpg

I voted NO on the reauthorization of Section 702 of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act. I believe in empowering the Intelligence Community with the tools to keep our country safe, but this bill neglects to adequately protect the privacy rights of the American people.
